Open House Cancelled This 1910 property with 10ft ceilings, offers luxury and space. The formal lounge room is wonderfully framed with classic white shutters filtering the incoming sun, whilst the updated country-style kitchen, is in keeping with the period charm. Double French doors lead to the external decking providing distant views to Cambewarra Mountain and to the covered breezeway where you can sit and relax, protected from the elements by classic timber framed windows. A fully insulated studio/office which is connected to the NBN (as is the main house), opens out to the large established gardens, creating a setting of privacy.
